title: Production Deployment Infrastructure Complete
details:
Completed comprehensive production deployment infrastructure for Codex Bootstrap (Helmsman AI) project.

MAJOR ACCOMPLISHMENTS:
✅ Production-optimized Docker containers with multi-stage builds, Alpine Linux, security hardening (non-root users UID 1001), tini init system
✅ Kubernetes deployments with HPA auto-scaling (backend: 2-10 replicas, frontend: 2-8 replicas)
✅ PostgreSQL StatefulSet with production tuning (200 connections, 50Gi storage, performance optimization)
✅ NGINX Ingress with SSL termination, rate limiting, CORS, WebSocket support on port 8001
✅ Comprehensive monitoring stack: Prometheus (30-day retention, 100Gi storage) + Grafana with custom dashboards
✅ Security infrastructure: Network policies, RBAC, secrets management, comprehensive health checks
✅ Complete CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions: testing, security scanning, multi-stage deployment
✅ Infrastructure automation scripts: deploy.sh and test-infrastructure.sh with comprehensive validation
✅ Detailed production deployment documentation with troubleshooting and maintenance guides

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:
- Docker: Multi-stage builds with security hardening, non-root execution, minimal attack surface
- Kubernetes: HPA autoscaling, resource limits, comprehensive probes (startup/readiness/liveness)
- Database: PostgreSQL with performance tuning, persistent storage, connection pooling
- Monitoring: Prometheus metrics collection, Grafana visualization, comprehensive alerting rules
- Security: SSL/TLS everywhere, network policies, secrets encryption, vulnerability scanning
- CI/CD: Automated testing, security scanning, staging/production deployment with rollback capability

INFRASTRUCTURE TESTING:
✅ All Kubernetes manifests validated (8/8 YAML files pass syntax validation)
✅ Security configurations validated (security contexts, non-root users, resource limits, network policies)
✅ Monitoring setup validated (Prometheus/Grafana manifests, scrape annotations, dashboards)
✅ Complete infrastructure ready for production deployment

FILES CREATED/ENHANCED:
- Enhanced Dockerfile.backend and Dockerfile.frontend with security hardening
- Complete Kubernetes manifests in k8s/ directory (8 files)
- CI/CD pipeline: .github/workflows/ci-cd.yml
- Deployment automation: scripts/deploy.sh and scripts/test-infrastructure.sh
- Comprehensive documentation: docs/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_INFRASTRUCTURE.md

This infrastructure supports the full WebSocket real-time system (773+ lines), OAuth authentication, calendar integration, and ADHD-optimized UI components with production-grade scalability, security, and observability.
